text: Had ordered roast duck and charsiew rice. Portion of the duck was miniscule, which made me wonder if it was a one-off or if it was a different person behind the counter. Because every other time I've eaten here, they serve a good of meat. And at $5.50, you'd expect a decent amount of meat. So I gave them the benefit of the doubt and ordered a second plate of duck and roast pork rice. To my horror, the portion was the same; measly. If you look at the picture, you can see the amount of duck they gave me in my second plate; more skin than meat, and the slices are small and flattened to absolute smithereens. A travesty.

Wanton noodles reasonably priced at S$3.50, char siu is pretty good with char edges and equal amount of fats and lean meat. Quite generous with the lard bits and sambal chilli and the chilli is quite decent for wanton mee. I added some ginger into the wanton noodles and it tasted decently acceptable.

The best old school type of chicken rice in paper wrapping. I've been buying from this stall for many years and chicken portion is generous and yummy. They gave achar instead of cucumbers. Price is reasonable. Roast chicken +roast pork rice is only $5.50.

Ordered Char siew rice add char siew, come back home is char siew with roasted pork. So wrote a big note for helper to bring and show to buy one more pack, the man apologize already but when come back home still gave char siew with roasted pork! Wasted my money! If no heart to work, then don't work stay at home! So disappointed with this service!

Been 2 years I've been ordering at this shop. Today I have to make this review. Attitude workers. Don't understand simple English. Good enough I never complaint about the mini roaches walking around the meat. You deserve this bad review because ur workers has a bad attitude.
